entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 this morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12 except minus 6 along the coast.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 overnight. Low minus 12 except minus 6 along the coast. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
